title: 6 including 2 children dead in accident at Kurunegala
content: Six people have died in a motor accident that occurred at Kirivawula area in Kurunegala today (27th) morning says our reporter at Kurunegala. A van from Uhumiya in Kurunegala carrying a group returning from a tour in Jaffna and a lorry transporting manure to Batticaloa have crashed head on at 6.00 a.m. today….
